description.0: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.

0.0: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate Sprint by <cryo>14%</cryo> for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by <cryo>20%</cryo> for 5s.
